sentences.en: A mountain range shown by this method can look like a hairy caterpillar.
sentences.cn: 采用这种方法表示的山脉看上去象一条毛虫.

sentences.en: a skinny guy with hairy legs
sentences.cn: 一个腿上多毛的干瘦男人

sentences.en: But there is more to Charles than his pert bottom and hairy chest.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯不光是有俏屁股和毛茸茸的胸脯。

sentences.en: He bared his muscular, hairy chest for a women's magazine.
sentences.cn: 他为一本女性杂志秀出了他那肌肉发达、毛发浓密的性感胸部。

sentences.en: He had taken that brooding, hairy monkey into his heart.
sentences.cn: 他竟把那么一只闷忧忧, 毛茸茸的猴子引为知己.

sentences.en: He was wearing shorts which showed his long, muscular, hairy legs.
sentences.cn: 他穿着短裤，露出自己强壮多毛的长腿。

sentences.en: His driving was a bit hairy.
It was rather hairy driving down that narrow road in the darkness.
sentences.cn: 黑夜在那条窄道上开车真可怕.

sentences.en: Its hairy body suggests a mammal.
sentences.cn: 它毛茸茸的身体表明它是哺乳动物。

sentences.en: Plants from equatorial regions have large, thin sparsely hairy leaves.
sentences.cn: 在赤道地区其植物叶片大而薄,并被以稀毛.

sentences.en: She thinks hairy chests are a turn - on!
sentences.cn: 她觉得胸部有毛很让人兴奋!

sentences.en: That hairy creature rates near the top of the deadly species list.
sentences.cn: 那种毛绒绒的可就快要上濒危榜首了.
那只熊的胸部毛茸茸的.

sentences.en: The engine sowed cinders and soot over the fiery flowers and the hairy knobs of weed.
sentences.cn: 火车烟囱喷出的煤屑和煤烟,纷纷落在田间怒放的野花和毛茸茸的杂草茎节上.

sentences.en: The plant has serrated and hairy leaves.
sentences.cn: 这棵植物长着锯齿状的毛茸茸的叶子。

sentences.en: Two huge , hairy ears stuck up above the snowdrift.
sentences.cn: 一对偌大的, 毛茸茸的耳朵竖起在雪堆上.

words.tran_cn: 毛发的；护理毛发的；用毛发制成的
有毛发的；长着...头发的（常用以构成复合词）
毛发似的；细微的；细长的
生长毛发；形成毛状纤维

trans.tran_cn: 多毛的，毛制的，仿毛的，[俚] 险象环生的，危险的
trans.tran_en: a hairy person or animal has a lot of hair on their body
